ModMetaData.name: SS Battery Fuse
ModMetaData.author: zymex
ModMetaData.description: [1.1] Just updated to 1.1 till Spdskatr come back. Please see: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=832328837 For original mod [1.0]A mod that adds additional fuses for the mod SS Bigger Batteries. Must be loaded after both RT Fuse and SS Bigger Batteries.
